content.rendered:
Someone called me yesterday asking about the dates and price for the 2014 Brand New Conference so that they could add it to their yearly budget so I figured others might want to know as well and also because we are already deep into the process for next year’s brand festivities.

Date: Thursday and Friday, September 25 and 26, 2014
That’s right, TWO days. 16 sessions. Double the fun.

City: Chicago, IL
One of the greatest cities in the world. Period.

Venue: Harris Theater at Millennium Park
We are beyond excited about this venue. It’s big, it’s classy, it’s right in Millennium Park. Photo above is from the auditorium, taken by yours truly.

Fees: Pre-sale $350 / Early-bird $400 / Regular $500 / Half off all fees for students
Although our costs are going to be nearly double, we decided to only do a slight increase — $100 more at the Regular pricing — to make this one of the most affordable conferences with a world-class roster of speakers FOR TWO days.

Pre-sale tickets — without speaker roster — will go on sale in early January. Early-bird in May. Regular in July.

So, save the date, save some money, get it in the budget.
